summary:
Tesla is an American company that makes electric cars and clean energy products like solar panels. It was started in 2003 and named after the inventor Nikola Tesla. Elon Musk joined and became the CEO in 2008. Tesla has made many car models, and the Model 3 was the first electric car to sell 1 million units.

Tesla is one of the most valuable companies worldwide. It has faced some legal issues and criticism but remains a leading electric vehicle manufacturer.
title: Tesla, Inc.
